author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: إنّا أردنا أن نذکر الفردوس الأعلی والمدینة المبارکة النّورآء الّتي فیها تضوّع عرف المحبوب وانتشرت آیاته وظهرت بیّناته ونصبت أعلامه وارتفع خبائه وفصّل فیها کلّ أمر حکیم
translation: It is Our wish to remember the Abode of supreme blissfulness (Ṭihrán), the holy and shining city — the city wherein the fragrance of the Well-Beloved hath been shed, wherein His signs have been diffused, wherein the evidences of His glory have been revealed, wherein His standards have been raised, wherein His tabernacle hath been pitched, wherein each of His wise decrees hath been unfolded.
